author.location: Essex but I'm nothing like the twats on the telly.

posts.content:
Ha, still think this is soooooo cool.
I've got this one as a tattoo on my calf so I'm kinda biased
J Harris wrote:


You say that you lay boards across the two benches to make the bed, similar to what my bro in law does on his Pitt. What he's got is a small cupboard against the long side with some bits of wood cut to bridge the gap but then screwed onto a couple of old bits of seatbelt so they form a sort of ladder that he just pulls out. When it's not in use it just concertinas back into the cupboard so it's packed away and all neat and tidy.

Shalom, Lee
